messages.messageContent: Was the standby unit activated? SystemCensor is asking
Yes
Yes we heard them talking near the house
It was activated
Take care of yourselves and all your families 🙏🏻
A big strong hug to all of us ❤️
Lock the safe rooms
Handle up
Don't open for anyone ❤️
Can someone calm things down here and say there are soldiers and no terrorists in our kibbutz 😨
There are terrorists
Don't open doors to people who look like soldiers
They are dressed like soldiers
Hold safe room doors

Hello loved ones
There's a bit of pressure and fear here, mainly on my side. I would greatly appreciate if someone could refrain from writing things that are a bit beyond what's necessary.

I agree with SystemCensor, and please don't write names/ houses/ neighborhoods
Not everyone can handle this information in this way

We are still in the middle of the event. Make sure to lock the houses.
In the last few hours we've been in contact with MDA, but the ambulances haven't arrived yet.
We'll continue to update
Don't share names on WhatsApp!!!!
The messaging system isn't working, SystemCensor occasionally sends messages to the kibbutz members distribution list.. I'll share here for those who aren't members
The army will start aerial operations in the settlement. Only answer if you hear 13, 13. Otherwise, don't answer!

Be aware,
Don't open the door for calls such as police and fire brigade.
Only for 13 13 or special forces
IDF wants to attack from the air in the settlement. Asking to inform all residents to stay indoors....
Special forces are inside the kibbutz, they passed by our house

We're indoors
No one is knocking at our door?😞
I hope they'll knock on the door.. We're in the same situation
The house doors are locked
Did anyone hear SystemCensor?????
Did anyone hear SystemCensor??
Does anyone feel they can calm me down? Please call
IDF is conducting air strikes in the kibbutz, everyone go indoors now
Niv Rivib (girl) and Nir Razi (boy) are residents, they've been here for less than a year, their house is on the edge
Trying to contact them. Do you know them?
Does anyone know?
There are reports of a voice saying to come out with hands up, don't listen to any voice...
Evacuation begins by the army. They'll knock on the door and inform about it. Please be patient
And those who aren't indoors
Waiting and hoping. We're indoors with a 3-month-old baby
They broke the door and entered our house
What do they say when they come? How do we know it's the IDF? Are they just breaking in?

They say IDF IDF
Ask for the battalion
They tell us which battalion they are from
And they also came to our house and said it's fine
Where are they directing us?
Please direct them to the houses near the pond
I'm begging!!!!!!
Terrorists in our house
Please help
They're right in front of us
They're saying they're our forces
Can SystemCensor confirm?
Can we ask them to go to the houses near the pond please
Planned aerial attack in the kibbutz area

Why is this taking so long?????
Where's our army?
Why aren't they sending all the special forces and battalions in the country to Gaza???
Did anyone hear SystemCensor
Questions we're all asking.and
How can I contact SystemCensor? My family is worried
Did anyone hear something from my parents? SystemCensor...…
Is there any information about SystemCensor?
Is there someone organizing the list of evacuees?
SystemCensor is at the rightmost house. I can't find the house number
In the young generation

What about SystemCensor? Did anyone hear anything?
What about SystemCensor?
What about SystemCensor ??
Please a bit of information about what's happening in the young generation

SystemCensor
What's happening in the young generation????
Please what's happening in the young generation ??????????
We still don't know anything
Don't get close to Road 4 everyone who's leaving the area 🙏🏼
Please go through the young generation!!! They're there!!!!!
SystemCensor does anyone know what's with her?
I saw her in Hodaya early morning
She and the whole family were evacuated from the kibbutz

I'm here SystemCensor
We were evacuated early morningSystemCensor
Does anyone know if SystemCensor my brother got on a bus
He was evacuated but not available
Got on

Now YAMAM in the young generation going house to house
SystemCensor
Yesssss
SystemCensor!!!!!!!! Please she's in the young generation
Please dismantle the young generation
